</FONT>
	any reference to a document is to that document as amended, varied or novated from time to time otherwise than in breach of this Agreement or that document.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	References to Recitals, Clauses, Subclauses, paragraphs, subparagraphs and Schedules shall be construed as reference to the recitals, clauses, subclauses, paragraphs, subparagraphs and schedules of this Agreement, unless otherwise specified.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Headings shall not be taken into consideration in the interpretation of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.3
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Accuracy and Rounding
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Unless otherwise expressly provided in this Agreement:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the calculation of all prices, charges and other sums owing under this Agreement and any adjustment required by the terms of this Agreement shall be performed to the nearest pence and one half of a pence shall be rounded up;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the calculation of any tonnage shall be rounded to the nearest tonne and one half of a tonne shall be rounded up; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	any other calculation involving figures set out or referred to in this Agreement shall be performed to the accuracy in which those figures are given.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	TERM OF AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Subject to Clause 3, this Agreement comes into force on the Agreement Date and continues in force through and including December&nbsp;31, 2034 (the
<B>
	Expiry Date
</B>
	), subject to earlier termination in accordance with Clause 18 (
<I>
	Default and Termination
</I>
	) (the
<B>
	Term
</B>
	).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	CONDITIONS PRECEDENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The rights and obligations of the Parties under Clauses 2 (
<I>
	Term of Agreement
</I>
	), 3 (
<I>
	Conditions Precedent
</I>
	), 16 (
<I>
	Change in Law and Sustainability Requirements
</I>
	), 19 (
<I>
	Representations and Warranties
</I>
	) and 20 (
<I>
	Anti-Bribery, Corruption and Counterparty Integrity
</I>
	) to 28 (
<I>
	Miscellaneous
</I>
	) (inclusive) will commence on the Agreement Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	All other rights and obligations of the Parties under this Agreement will commence on the date on which the Purchaser has notified the Seller that it has secured a fully effective agreement to re-sell the Biomass to be delivered hereunder to a third party that owns a Facility (such date, the
<B>
	Effective Date
</B>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	If the Effective Date does not occur by the Longstop Date, then either Party may terminate this Agreement without liability upon providing written notice to the other Party at any time prior to the Effective Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	SALE AND PURCHASE OBLIGATIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Sale and purchase of Biomass
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	During the Term, the Seller agrees to sell and make available to the Purchaser at the Delivery Point, and the Purchaser agrees to purchase and take delivery at the Delivery Point of, wood pellets in the quantities and in accordance with the price and other terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	[Reserved]
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.3
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.4
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Right of Inspection
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The Seller shall procure that the Purchaser (no more than once every three (3)&nbsp;months) may inspect, itself or via its designated representatives, any part of the Seller&#146;s operations (or, to the extent practicable, those of its suppliers) related to the production, handling, processing, transport, sampling, analysis, loading, invoicing or delivery of Biomass under this Agreement, including all records related thereto (subject to confidentiality obligations herein), in each case to the extent necessary for Purchaser to confirm Seller&#146;s compliance with this Agreement, provided that the Purchaser may only exercise such right during regular business hours, upon no less than thirty (30) days&#146; advance notice to the Seller and so as not to disrupt the operations of the Seller or its suppliers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	TITLE AND RISK
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Title and risk of loss
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Subject to Clause 10.7 (
<I>
	Rejection Implications
</I>
	) and Clause 14.5(b)&nbsp;(
<I>
	Late Payments
</I>
	), title to and risk of loss of all Biomass delivered by the Seller under this Agreement will pass to the Purchaser as the Biomass is loaded onto a Vessel (i.e. when it passes over the Vessel&#146;s rail) at the Loading Port (in accordance with CIF Incoterms 2010 except as otherwise provided herein).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Without prejudice to Clause 10.7 (
<I>
	Rejection Implications
</I>
	), delivery shall be final and complete upon passage of title and risk under this Clause 5.1, notwithstanding Seller&#146;s obligation to cause Shipments to arrive, or Purchaser&#146;s obligation to accept and discharge such Shipments, in each case at the Discharging Port as and when required herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	No
</B>
<B>
	Adverse
</B>
<B>
	Claim
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The Seller warrants and undertakes to ensure that it will, at the time title passes to the Purchaser under this Agreement, have good and valid title to all Biomass delivered to the Purchaser hereunder and that all such Biomass shall be free and clear of all liens, charges, mortgages, pledges, security interests, claims for taxes or royalties and other encumbrances or adverse claims.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	If any claim (an
<B>
	Adverse Claim
</B>
	) arises as a result of a breach of Clause 5.2(a)&nbsp;above and attaches with respect to any such Biomass and/or monies due therefor:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the Seller must immediately remove such Adverse Claim or post a bond or other security therefor in accordance with applicable law and otherwise in a manner reasonably satisfactory to the Purchaser; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	(ii)

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the Purchaser may, until such Adverse Claim is removed or a bond or other security has been so posted in accordance with the preceding paragraph, retain in escrow, as security for the performance of the Seller&#146;s obligations with respect to any such Adverse Claim, all sums of money then due and owing by the Purchaser to the Seller and which may thereafter accrue to the Seller, up to the amount of the obligations secured by such Adverse Claim.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

	6.

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	FULL SUPPLY COMMENCEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Full Supply Commencement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	From and after the First Full Supply Delivery Date, the Seller must deliver and the Purchaser must accept Biomass at the Delivery Point on the terms and conditions specified in this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Annual Base Quantity Revision
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	[Reserved]
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	As further envisaged in Clause 12.3(c), the Purchaser may, on not less than 180 days written notice, inform the Seller that it wishes to adjust the Annual Base Quantity applicable to the remainder of that Delivery Year, or the following Delivery Year by transferring no more than the Maintenance Flex Volume between Delivery Years.&#160; In the event that the Purchaser issues a notice under this paragraph (b):
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	any Shipment deemed as part of the Maintenance Flex Volume postponed by the Purchaser from one Delivery Year (the
<B>
	1
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	st
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
	&#160;Delivery Year
</B>
	) to the following Delivery Year (the
<B>
	2
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	nd
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
	&#160;Delivery Year
</B>
	) under this paragraph (b)&nbsp;will be added to the Annual Base Quantity for the 2
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	nd
</FONT>
	&#160;Delivery Year.&#160; The Purchaser shall not be permitted to make any further adjustments to the Annual Base Quantity for the 2
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	nd
</FONT>
	&#160;Delivery Year under this Clause 7.2(b).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	any Shipment deemed as part of the Maintenance Flex Volume brought by the Purchaser from one Delivery Year (the
<B>
	2nd Delivery Year
</B>
	) to the current Delivery Year (the
<B>
	1
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	st
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
	&#160;Delivery Year
</B>
	) under this paragraph (b)&nbsp;will be added to the Annual Base Quantity for the 1
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	st
</FONT>
	&#160;Delivery Year and the Purchaser shall not be permitted to make any further adjustments to the Annual Base Quantity for either the 1
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	st
</FONT>
	&#160;or the 2
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	nd
</FONT>
	&#160;Delivery Years under this Clause 7.2(b).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The price of any Shipment moved by the Purchaser under either paragraphs (i)&nbsp;or (ii)&nbsp;above shall be the price which would have been applicable in the 2
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	nd
</FONT>
	&#160;Delivery Year.&#160; Notwithstanding anything to the contrary, this Clause 7.2(b)&nbsp;shall not apply to the first Delivery Year.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	BIOMASS QUANTITY
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	[Reserved]
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.2
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Annual Base Quantity
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	For each Delivery Year through to the end of the Term the Seller will sell and deliver and the Purchaser will purchase and accept the Annual Base Quantity applicable to that Delivery Year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	13
<A NAME="A2227637ZEX-10_22_HTM_24818-2-KS-03_PB_13_071701_2897">
</A>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage34"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.3
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Option Quantities
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	[Reserved]
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Option Quantities
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The Purchaser may require the Seller, by written notice, to sell and deliver (in which case the Seller will sell and deliver and the Purchaser will purchase and accept) up to six (6)&nbsp;Shipments in the aggregate during the period from December&nbsp;31, 2018 through September&nbsp;30, 2019; provided, that the volume of each such Shipment shall be 50,000 Tonnes, +/- 10% at the Seller&#146;s option.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Any Purchaser&#146;s notice under paragraph (b)(i)&nbsp;above shall be given simultaneously with Purchaser&#146;s delivery of an Early Delivery Schedule in accordance with Clause 12.1(a).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.4
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Delivery Failure
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	In the event that the Vessel delivering any Shipment of Biomass fails to tender valid NOR at the Discharging Port during the Delivery Window applicable to that Shipment (other than as a consequence of Force Majeure), then it shall constitute a
<B>
	Delivery Failure
</B>
	by the Seller and the quantity of Biomass to which the Delivery Failure relates shall constitute a
<B>
	Delivery Shortfall
</B>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	In the event of a Delivery Failure the Purchaser may (in its absolute discretion) elect to purchase a volume of biomass up to the Delivery Shortfall from a third party, in which case:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the Seller will reimburse to the Purchaser the Difference Price (as calculated in accordance with paragraph (c)&nbsp;below), in accordance with Clause 14.3 (
<I>
	Other Invoices
</I>
	); and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	(notwithstanding any such purchase from a third party), the Delivery Shortfall shall be deemed to have been delivered by the Seller and paid for by the Purchaser for purposes of Clause 8.5 (
<I>
	Take or Pay
</I>
	) and Clause 12.3(d)&nbsp;(
<I>
	Variations to Delivery Schedules
</I>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The Purchaser shall calculate the
<B>
	Difference Price
</B>
	in relation to any Delivery Shortfall which shall be equal to:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the Market Price for the biomass purchased by the Purchaser under paragraph (b)&nbsp;above; less
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the portion of the Shipment Value of the Delivery Shortfall attributable to an amount of Biomass equal to the biomass purchased by the Purchaser under paragraph (b)&nbsp;above which would have been paid by the Purchaser had the Purchaser taken delivery of that Delivery Shortfall (assuming the Shipment Value for that Delivery Shortfall with a figure of V (as defined in Clause 14.1 (
<I>
	Shipment Value
</I>
	)) equal to seventeen (17) for the first Shipment and thereafter the weighted average Net Calorific Value of Shipments delivered over the prior 365-day period); plus
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	any reasonable and documented additional direct losses, costs or expenses incurred by the Purchaser in relation to the Seller failing to deliver the Delivery Shortfall (including additional transportation charges, legal costs, deadfreight, storage costs, handling costs, Taxes or duties, and interest), and actual damages and expenses
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	14
<A NAME="A2227637ZEX-10_22_HTM_24818-2-KS-03_PB_14_071807_3020">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=16,EFW="2227637",CP="ENVIVA PARTNERS, LP",DN="3",CHK=442691,FOLIO='14',FILE="DISK121:[15ZDB2.15ZDB41802]24818-2-KS-03_ZDB41802.CHC",USER="VRIVERA",CD='MAR 7 08:46 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage35"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	suffered or incurred by the Purchaser as a result of entering into any agreements relating to that Delivery Shortfall.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If the Difference Price as calculated under this paragraph (c)&nbsp;would be a negative number, the Difference Price shall be deemed to be zero for that Delivery Shortfall.&#160; The Purchaser will promptly notify the Difference Price to the Seller with reasonable supporting documentation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	For the avoidance of doubt, the Purchaser shall not be entitled to reject any Delivery Shortfall and the Seller shall be entitled to deliver (and the Purchaser shall be required to accept and pay for) that Delivery Shortfall outside of the relevant Delivery Window provided that (i)&nbsp;such delivery is at a time acceptable to the Purchaser which does not adversely interfere with biomass shipments from other suppliers but is otherwise as soon as reasonably practicable after the Shipment is available for delivery; and (ii)&nbsp;the Annual Operational Delivery Schedule and Annual Base Quantity shall be subject to adjustment in accordance with Clause 12.3(e)&nbsp;(
<I>
	Variations to Delivery Schedules
</I>
	) in the event that the Purchaser has purchased replacement biomass under paragraph (b)&nbsp;above.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.5
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Take or Pay
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The Parties agree that the Purchaser will purchase and accept from the Seller in each Delivery Year the Annual Base Quantity specified for that Delivery Year in Schedule 2 (
<I>
	Annual Base Quantities
</I>
	) (as amended in accordance with Clause 7.2 (
<I>
	Annual Base Quantity Revision
</I>
	) above).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	In the event that the Purchaser fails to accept (or indicates to the Seller that it intends not to accept) delivery of a Shipment which has been scheduled as part of the Annual Operational Delivery Schedule or has otherwise been ordered and scheduled in accordance with Clause 8.3 (
<I>
	Option Quantities
</I>
	) (but which has not been removed from the Annual Operational Delivery Schedule under Clause 12.3(c)&nbsp;or (d)&nbsp;(
<I>
	Variations to Delivery Schedules
</I>
	)), or the Seller elects to cause title to revert to the Seller in accordance with Clause 14.5(b)&nbsp;other than as a result of:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	a valid full or partial rejection of that Shipment as contemplated under Clause 10.6 (
<I>
	Rejection
</I>
	); or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Force Majeure as contemplated under Clause 15.4 (
<I>
	Effect of Force Majeure
</I>
	),
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	then the quantity of the relevant Shipment not taken shall be the
<B>
	Take or Pay Shortfall
</B>
	provided that, for the avoidance of doubt, volumes of Biomass in relation to which the Storage Option is implemented shall not constitute a Take or Pay Shortfall volume.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	In relation to any Take or Pay Shortfall:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the Seller shall use reasonable endeavours to sell the Take or Pay Shortfall at the best price reasonably obtainable in the market after taking into account any potential buyers of biomass notified to the Seller by the Purchaser; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the Seller will calculate the
<B>
	Difference Price
</B>
	in relation to the Take or Pay Shortfall which shall be equal to:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 2.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(A)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the amount of the Shipment Value for that Take or Pay Shortfall (assuming a figure of V (as defined in Clause 14.1 (
<I>
	Shipment Value
</I>
	)) equal to seventeen (17) for the first Shipment and thereafter the weighted average
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 2.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	15
<A NAME="A2227637ZEX-10_22_HTM_24818-2-KS-03_PB_15_072017_7748">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage36"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 2.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 2.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Net Calorific Value of Shipments delivered over the prior 365-day period); plus
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 2.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(B)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	any reasonable and documented additional direct losses, costs or expenses incurred by the Seller in relation to the Purchaser failing to take delivery of the Take or Pay Shortfall (including additional transportation charges, transaction costs associated with unwinding agreements to hedge foreign exchange risk, legal costs, deadfreight, storage costs, handling costs, Taxes or duties, and interest), and actual damages and expenses suffered or incurred by the Seller as a result of entering into any agreements relating to that Take or Pay Shortfall; less
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 2.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(C)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the Market Price for that Take or Pay Shortfall.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If the Difference Price as calculated under this paragraph (ii)&nbsp;would be a negative number, the Difference Price shall be deemed to be zero for that Take or Pay Shortfall.&#160; The Seller will promptly notify the Difference Price to the Purchaser with reasonable supporting documentation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 106.55PT;TEXT-INDENT:-34.55PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	If the Difference Price calculated under paragraph (ii)&nbsp;above is a positive number an amount equal to the Difference Price (less any amount actually paid by the Purchaser in relation to that Take or Pay Shortfall in accordance with Clause 14.2 (
<I>
	Payment
</I>
	)) shall be payable by the Purchaser to the Seller in accordance with Clause 14.3 (
<I>
	Other Invoices
</I>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	WEIGHING, SAMPLING AND TESTING
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In this Agreement:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	all determinations involving the sampling and testing of biomass will be made in accordance with the Agreed Sampling and Analysis Procedure; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	all weight determinations must be made in accordance with the Agreed Weighing Procedure.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	BIOMASS QUALITY
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.1
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
	Biomass Specifications
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The Seller must:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	ensure that all biomass delivered under this Agreement meets the Specifications;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	keep the Purchaser informed in advance of any matter which may materially affect the quality of biomass to be delivered under this Agreement and comply with any reasonable request made by the Purchaser for additional information to enable investigation by the Purchaser relating to the quality of any biomass; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	co-operate in good faith with the Purchaser to agree upon actions to be taken by the Parties to minimise any operational problems which may be experienced by the Purchaser associated with:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	the handling of the Biomass;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Extraneous Material in the biomass at the time of delivery; or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	16
<A NAME="A2227637ZEX-10_22_HTM_24818-2-KS-03_PB_16_072212_141">
</A>
